initial_question.title: [Bug] Error on 1.0.1
initial_question.body:
### General

- [X] I have updated to the latest version of Nexterm.
- [X] My bug has not been reported yet.

### The Bug

Latest version 1.0.1 don't start , it log a error:
Error: Could not find a free port for Guacamole


### What device are you using to access the page?

In the browser

### Which operating system is your Nexterm instance running on?

Linux

satisfaction_conditions: Container deployment remains persistent across system restarts
Application remains accessible via web browser
